name: Energy Channeling
description: Techniques to direct and manipulate psionic energy flows.

cards.title: Directing Energy Through the Body
cards.description: Practices for channeling energy along meridians and pathways.
cards.bulletpoints: Qi Flow Awareness, Hand-to-Hand Energy Transfer, Breath-Driven Energy Circulation
cards.summaryText: Guide qi along the meridians with breath and hands until flow feels seamless.

cards.title: Amplifying and Releasing Psionic Energy
cards.description: Techniques to store, build, and discharge energy effectively.
cards.bulletpoints: Energy Accumulation, Projection Training, Discharge Control
cards.summaryText: Stack energy, surge it forward, and release with precise control.
